content:
I run

lake exe cache get

and get

info: [2/9] Compiling Cache.IO
info: [3/9] Compiling Cache.Hashing
info: [4/9] Compiling Cache.Requests
info: [5/9] Compiling Cache.Main
error: > /home/user/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.6.0-rc1/bin/leanc -c -o ./.lake/packages/mathlib/.lake/build/ir/Cache/IO.c.o ./.lake/packages/mathlib/.lake/build/ir/Cache/IO.c -O3 -DNDEBUG
error: stderr:
/home/user/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.6.0-rc1/bin/clang: symbol lookup error: /home/user/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.6.0-rc1/bin/../lib/libclang-cpp.so.15: undefined symbol: _ZTVN4llvm2cl11OptionValueINSt3__112basic_stringIcNS2_11char_traitsIcEENS2_9allocatorIcEEEEEE, version LLVM_15
error: external command `/home/user/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.6.0-rc1/bin/leanc` exited with code 127
error: > /home/user/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.6.0-rc1/bin/leanc -c -o ./.lake/packages/mathlib/.lake/build/ir/Cache/Hashing.c.o ./.lake/packages/mathlib/.lake/build/ir/Cache/Hashing.c -O3 -DNDEBUG
error: stderr:
/home/user/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.6.0-rc1/bin/clang: symbol lookup error: /home/user/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.6.0-rc1/bin/../lib/libclang-cpp.so.15: undefined symbol: _ZTVN4llvm2cl11OptionValueINSt3__112basic_stringIcNS2_11char_traitsIcEENS2_9allocatorIcEEEEEE, version LLVM_15
error: external command `/home/user/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.6.0-rc1/bin/leanc` exited with code 127
error: > /home/user/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.6.0-rc1/bin/leanc -c -o ./.lake/packages/mathlib/.lake/build/ir/Cache/Requests.c.o ./.lake/packages/mathlib/.lake/build/ir/Cache/Requests.c -O3 -DNDEBUG
error: stderr:
/home/user/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.6.0-rc1/bin/clang: symbol lookup error: /home/user/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.6.0-rc1/bin/../lib/libclang-cpp.so.15: undefined symbol: _ZTVN4llvm2cl11OptionValueINSt3__112basic_stringIcNS2_11char_traitsIcEENS2_9allocatorIcEEEEEE, version LLVM_15
error: external command `/home/user/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.6.0-rc1/bin/leanc` exited with code 127
error: > /home/user/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.6.0-rc1/bin/leanc -c -o ./.lake/packages/mathlib/.lake/build/ir/Cache/Main.c.o ./.lake/packages/mathlib/.lake/build/ir/Cache/Main.c -O3 -DNDEBUG
error: stderr:
/home/user/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.6.0-rc1/bin/clang: symbol lookup error: /home/user/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.6.0-rc1/bin/../lib/libclang-cpp.so.15: undefined symbol: _ZTVN4llvm2cl11OptionValueINSt3__112basic_stringIcNS2_11char_traitsIcEENS2_9allocatorIcEEEEEE, version LLVM_15
error: external command `/home/user/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.6.0-rc1/bin/leanc` exited with code 127

I have encountered similar problems before, but it goes away when I compiled a cpp program.

It seems that clang in the elan toolchain just won't launch.

/home/xiyuzhai/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.6.0-rc1/bin/clang

gives

/home/xiyuzhai/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.6.0-rc1/bin/clang: symbol lookup error: /home/xiyuzhai/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.6.0-rc1/bin/../lib/libclang-cpp.so.15: undefined symbol: _ZTVN4llvm2cl11OptionValueINSt3__112basic_stringIcNS2_11char_traitsIcEENS2_9allocatorIcEEEEEE, version LLVM_15

uname gives

Linux 6.5.0-18-generic #18~22.04.1-Ubuntu SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Wed Feb  7 11:40:03 UTC 2 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
Xiyu Zhai has marked this topic as resolved.
